application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T10531 Plane (top of Duck Lawn)  lift lower canopy and remove overhanging limb to suitable growth point 						T10841 Common lime - deadwood throughout crown; T10841 Common lime - deadwood throughout crown					 T10494 Pissards Plum - remove lowest limb over path ; T10501 Silver Maple - lift low canopy and reduce back limbs over court		T10500 English Oak - lift low canopy and reduce back limbs over court	 T10755, 10756, 10757, 10758 Holly - reduce by 2m all over and shape; Buxus by T10755-10758 - reduce crown and remove deadwood 	 T10815, T10816 Magnolia Grandiflora - reduce and shape, lift over roof T10847, 10847, 10650, 10651 Montpellier Maples - reduce by 2-3m to alleviate loading on main stem. Remove deadwood in crown. G10593 tree of heaven - Duck Island - Remove main dead/declining tree in centre and grind stump. Remove remaining trees and grind stumps for replanting.T10690 & T10691 Holly by waste compound - reduce and lift and reshape to prevent being hit by trucks and tractor etc.T10694 Cherry near waste compound - reduce crown all over by 2m behind deadwood. Remove all interior deadwood and shape.T10517 Eucalyptus next to robinia by lake - re-pollardT10708 Weeping ash in playground - under stress, remove all deadwood, lift and reduce crown.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
